metadata.Description: The Decentralized Renewable Energy Framework focuses on promoting local, small-scale renewable energy solutions to enhance energy access in remote and rural areas, supporting energy independence and sustainability.

Decentralized Renewable Energy Framework.Description: The framework supports the development of microgrids, which provide reliable, renewable energy to small, isolated communities.
It promotes the use of solar home systems to provide off-grid energy solutions that are scalable and sustainable.
The framework guides community energy planning to integrate local renewable energy resources effectively.
It enhances local energy governance by empowering communities to manage and control their energy resources.
